revised_title: A Case of an Extraordinary Dwarf: Observations and Medical Analysis
tldr: The letter describes the case of a 15-year-old dwarf with a height of no more than two feet seven inches and a weight of thirteen pounds. The young man suffers from the miseries and ailments of old age, including weak eyesight, poor hearing, and a weak body. The author, John Browning, provides a detailed account of the boy's condition, his family's background, and the gradual decline in his health since the age of seven.
